title: Bug of “Heartseeker  Orianna”
body: This skin causes more than one pointers of ori's ball present but only one of them are show the position of the ball correctly

replies.body: It's not the skin, she's  just visually buggy, for instance, place your ball on an ally and ult right when they die, your ball disappears until you cast another spell.
y they still not fix it{{item:3070}}
Because Ori feels not love nor pain, thus she cannot cry when her friend dies (ball), but we know, Orianna is hurting, she just cannot express it. :(

Hey Miyauchi Renge - 

Thanks for the report! This actually isn't skin-specific and is affecting the champion as a whole. We're currently investigating!

Yeh, I've noticed this too on TPA. I had 5 indicators around me at once at the end of the game, and only really noticed it heading to another lane. I usually don't look at my champion much when I play outside of the start of the game, so it seemed weird to me and I assumed it was a 1 time thing.

This is an ongoing bug, with all Ori skins (including the classic). When a champion dies with the ball attached, it becomes invisible and creates a new indicator in the direction they were when they died.
also just in general, if you leave the radius of the ball it comes back but isnt visable. Also if you self cast your E the ball also disappears. {{item:3073}}
